name: PULSE Predictive Flow Framework
description: Six-gate macro-to-micro pipeline.  Generates `pulse_ready` signals once all gates have passed.

gates.name: Context Gate
gates.rule: Trend = HH/HL or LH/LL AND unmitigated POI aligns with discount (bull) or premium (bear) AND upcoming session historically favours the bias

gates.name: Liquidity Gate
gates.rule: Must observe (Asian sweep OR 2-hour swing sweep OR Wyckoff Spring/UTAD) followed by an impulsive snap-back

gates.name: Structure Gate
gates.rule: Change-of-Character on high volume (≥1.5× 30-bar median).  Optional BoS strengthens score.

gates.name: Imbalance Gate
gates.rule: FVG (or Wyckoff LPS) created by the structure-flip impulse.  Entry zone = gap edges ±50 %.

gates.name: Risk Gate
gates.rule: Stop three pips beyond swing.  TP ladder: M1/M5 liquidity → M15 POI → HTF objective.

gates.name: Confluence Gate
gates.rule: Score = Σ(weights × checks).  Reduce position size 50 % if score < 0.75.
